choice.CHOOSE_TEXT: We want to give you the most optimal information. So we ask you to make a choice from the following roles:

home-intro.YOU_ARE_HIRER: Are you tired of the time and effort involved in hiring flex workers?
home-intro.YOU_ARE_SUPPLIER: If an invoice is correct we simply have to make sure it's made payable
home-intro.YOU_ARE_INTERIM: Your people work hard at your customers, then it starts
home-intro.YOU_ARE_FREELANCER: As a freelancer you want to control everything in one application
home-intro.THING_OF_PAST: We promise you that's a thing of the past.

cookie.BANNER_TEXT: This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website.

contact-section.INTRO: Interested in FlexForceMonkey? Or are you interested in a demo? Fill in the following form and we will contact you as soon as possible.
contact-section.NAME: Name
contact-section.SUBJECT: Subject
contact-section.SEND_SUCCESS: Your form has been sent successfully. We will contact you as soon as possible!

database.LOG_IN_INTRO: Only an admin can see this page.

mailchimp.HIRER_TEXT: Do you want to stay up-to-date with the latest news from FlexForceMonkey as a hirer? Sign up for our newsletter!
mailchimp.SUPPLIER_TEXT: Do you want to stay up-to-date with the latest news from FlexForceMonkey as a supplier? Sign up for our newsletter!
mailchimp.INTERIM_TEXT: Do you want to stay up-to-date with the latest news from FlexForceMonkey as a supplier of interim workers? Sign up for our newsletter!
mailchimp.FREELANCER_TEXT: Do you want to stay up-to-date with the latest news from FlexForceMonkey as a freelancer? Sign up for our newsletter!
mailchimp.CURIOUS_TEXT: Do you want to stay up-to-date with the latest news from FlexForceMonkey? Sign up for our newsletter!
